title: Multiple Price Proposal Response
description: Latest price and other details for a given contract

proposal_array.title: Multiple Price Proposal Response
proposal_array.description: Latest price and other details for a given contract

barrier.description: Barrier for the contract (or last digit prediction for digit contracts). Contracts less than 24 hours in duration would need a relative barrier (barriers which need +/-), meaning that the entry spot would be adjusted accordingly with that amount to define a barrier.

barrier2.description: Low barrier for the contract (for contracts with two barriers). Contracts less than 24 hours in duration would need a relative barrier (barriers which need +/-), meaning that the entry spot would be adjusted accordingly with that amount to define a barrier.

longcode.description: Example: Win payout if Random 100 Index is strictly higher than entry spot at 15 minutes after contract start time.

display_value.description: Example: 5.14, same as ask_price except for spread contracts

spot.description: Spot value (if there are no Exchange data-feed licensing restrictions for the underlying symbol). Example: 9874.52

id.description: A stream id that can be used to cancel this stream using the Forget request. Example: 1d6651e7d599bce6c54bd71a8283e579

req_id.description: Optional field send in request to map to response, present only when request contains req_id
